data.text: @Annchap43858665 There was never anything to fix. These 2 have a very tight relationship. Keith will travel half way around the world to see Nic & their girls for one or two nights. When Nic isn't filming, he flies home every night and back to his gig the next day, or Nic and the girls follow him
@Annchap43858665 They didn't...It's just a BS story to begin with...#Noretreat #Notryingtofixanything #Itsjustaniotherstory
Well im glad they worked it out💓
